ENGLISH: Hey there, Sybil was it?\! \n[8] says you're good people so you're alright with me.\! Good fightin' out there.
ZH-cn: 嘿，是茜比尔吗？\!\n[8]说你人不错，所以你应该也能跟我合得来。\!刚刚的战斗真是出色。

ENGLISH: Thanks! Hey, right back at you Mr. Barnabas.\! Pretty good for an old farmer type.
ZH-cn: 谢谢！嘿，你打的也不错巴纳巴斯。\!一个老农这么厉害挺难得。

ENGLISH: That's Master Sergeant Barnabas to you, lady!
ZH-cn: 你得叫我巴纳巴斯军士长，女士！

ENGLISH: Yeah, whatever.\! Hey just let me know if you need to take a rest, I am a healer, ya know!
ZH-cn: 是啦，怎样都好。\!嘿，如果你顶不住了需要休息，跟我说就好，你知道我是个治疗师的！

ENGLISH: What the-\! Sharp tongue on this one!
ZH-cn: 什么——\!你这人的嘴巴可真凌厉！

ENGLISH: Hey now, just giving you a hard time!\! Figured a military guy like yourself would be used to it!
ZH-cn: 嘿等下，我就是在跟你贫嘴而已！\!还以为你这样的军人早就习惯了呢！

ENGLISH: Never was the type to go straight into the jokes.\! Gotta feel someone out a bit first!\! Ya know, wine 'n dine me before ya ask for a kiss, heh heh!
ZH-cn: 我可不是那种玩笑开得特别溜的人。\!得先读一下空气才行！\!你知道的，在要求亲吻之前请先吃完饭，嘿嘿！

ENGLISH: Um... ewww?\! Sorry Mr. Farmer, I'm keepin' my options open right now!
ZH-cn: 嗯……呃？\!抱歉，农夫先生，那我可不确定是不是还要跟你了啊！

ENGLISH: !!!\! What the-\! That ain't what I meant!
Hahahaha! Too easy!\! Hey I like you.\! Let's stick together out there, eh?\! Seems I'm not the only one with something to learn!
ZH-cn: 哈哈哈哈！真容易上钩啊！\!嘿，我喜欢你。\!让我们互相照应，如何？\!看来我不是唯一一个有东西要学的人！

ENGLISH: Sigh...\| You're gonna be trouble, I can tell.\! Glad you're on our side!
ZH-cn: 唉……\|你可不好对付，我看得出来。\!很高兴你站在我们这边！
